1.content:
Our tale is about how a being from another world changed the lives of the people she met. And ended up bringing each of them happiness in ways they could have never imagined

A mysterious portal opened up in a snow filled land.Out of that portal emerged a young girl weaken to the brink of fainting , from the unknown causes that had forced her here. Half dead and barley breathing , when by a storke luck she collapsed on the foot steps of the heart family.And not even five minutes after she collapsed a women opened the door.

oh dear whats happend to you the women said , we have to get her inside ren , rei hurry come and help.dont worry dear its going to be okay shae said with great concern.*and so for the next 2 hours they worked non stop to help the mysterious girl recover* okay kids we've done all we can do you two go to sleep , be careful not to wake up the twins on your way ok said their mom. k ren and rei replied.And as they went to sleep the mother found a around the girl neck that said Aserath.could that be her name she thought ,well i guess it can wait sleep well dear see you in the morning she said to the girl as she went to bed.
1.title: The new girl

11.content:
The next morning everyone woke to find that the mysterious girl had recovered as if nothing had happened.Everyone rush at here with a barrage of questions , like who are you ,why were you alone in the snow , where did you come from.

And with loud yell their mom said shut up!! okay now let me introduce everyone , the big guy to my left is my husband tye , the half awake zombies to my right are rei and ren . *baby crie's* honey go get the babies pwease , sure hun.okay the two ankle bitters my husband are getting are my twin's Stephane an Zel.And last but not least the two on the couch are my parents shinra and kai A.K.A grandma and grandpa.

Now what is you name dear . Its Aserath and i would like to thank you by giving you and your family a gift. A spell that will give any of you , your hearts desire.All you need to do is tell me what it is and i will make it happen. now who's first she said with a smile
